content: I just randomly bumped into this: https://docs.savannahhq.com ...it seems to be early dev/alpha, but it is an interesting concept, so I'm curious if there are other such apps out there.
...also can CiviCRM be used for thes3 purposes? ...IOW, can you poll GitHub, chat, forum posts etc. for metrics?
Either the community is getting super active by the day, or I have lost my edge to be able to keep up :sweat_smile:
